title: Hoops Tonight - Celtics-Warriors Game 1 breakdown: Steph Curry, Draymond & Dubs collapse vs Boston
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Celtics-Warriors Game 1 breakdown: Steph Curry, Draymond & Dubs collapse vs Boston
description:
Jason Timpf reviews Game 1 of the Celtics-Warriors NBA Finals. What led to Steph Curry, Draymond Green, and the Warriors' 4th quarter collapse against Jayson Tatum and the Celtics? Will Golden State rebound in Game 2? #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
